<%@ Page Language="C#" AutoEventWireup="true" CodeBehind="WebForm1.aspx.cs" Inherits="WebApplicationTest.WebForm1" %> <!DOCTYPE html> <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"> <head runat="server"> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" /> <title></title> </head> <body> <form id="form1" runat="server"> <div> <asp:FileUpload ID="fuImage" runat="server" /> <asp:Button ID="btnUpload" runat="server" Text="ä¸Šå‚³" OnClick="btnUpload_Click" /> <asp:Label ID="lblMessage" runat="server"></asp:Label> </div> </form> </body> </html> using System; using System.Collections.Generic; using System.Drawing; using System.IO; using System.Web; namespace WebApplicationTest { public partial class WebForm1 : System.Web.UI.Page { protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) { } protected void btnUpload_Click(object sender, EventArgs e) { // 1. æª¢æŸ¥Byte: å„åœ–æª”æ‰€è¦å°æ‡‰çš„Header Dictionary<string, byte[]> imageHeader = new Dictionary<string, byte[]>(); imageHeader.Add("JPG", new byte[] { 0xFF, 0xD8, 0xFF, 0xE0 }); imageHeader.Add("JPEG", new byte[] { 0xFF, 0xD8, 0xFF, 0xE0 }); imageHeader.Add("PNG", new byte[] { 0x89, 0x50, 0x4E, 0x47 }); imageHeader.Add("TIF", new byte[] { 0x49, 0x49, 0x2A, 0x00 }); imageHeader.Add("TIFF", new byte[] { 0x49, 0x49, 0x2A, 0x00 }); imageHeader.Add("GIF", new byte[] { 0x47, 0x49, 0x46, 0x38 }); imageHeader.Add("BMP", new byte[] { 0x42, 0x4D }); imageHeader.Add("ICO", new byte[] { 0x00, 0x00, 0x01, 0x00 }); if (fuImage.HasFile) { // å–å¾—æª”æ¡ˆå‰¯æª”å string fileExt = fuImage.FileName.Substring(fuImage.FileName.LastIndexOf('.') + 1).ToUpper(); // è©²å‰¯æª”åæ‡‰è©²è¦å°æ‡‰çš„Byte byte[] tmp = imageHeader[fileExt]; byte[] header = new byte[tmp.Length]; // å–å¾—Uploadæª”æ¡ˆçš„Headerè³‡è¨Š fuImage.FileContent.Read(header, 0, header.Length); // æ¯”å°å‰¯æª”åæ˜¯å¦èˆ‡çœŸå¯¦æª”æ¡ˆé¡å‹ä¸€è‡´ if (CompareArray(tmp, header)) { lblMessage.Text = "Valid ." + fileExt + " file."; } else { lblMessage.Text = "Invalid ." + fileExt + " file."; } // æŒ‡å®šæ ¼å¼å­˜æ–°åœ–(é˜²æ­¢å¥‡æ€ªçš„åˆä½µåœ–æª”ï¼Œæ¿¾æ‰å¾Œé¢çš„) Stream strmStream = fuImage.PostedFile.InputStream; Image image = Image.FromStream(strmStream, true); string exePath = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory; image.Save(exePath + Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(fuImage.FileName) + "." + (new ImageFormatConverter().ConvertToString(image.RawFormat)).ToLower(), image.RawFormat); } else { lblMessage.Text = "Please select image file."; } } private bool CompareArray(byte[] a1, byte[] a2) { if (a1.Length != a2.Length) return false; for (int i = 0; i < a1.Length; i++) { if (a1[i] != a2[i]) return false; } return true; } } }

protected void btnUploadClick2(object sender, EventArgs e) { // 1. æª¢æŸ¥Byte: å„åœ–æª”æ‰€è¦å°æ‡‰çš„Header Dictionary<string, byte[]> imageHeader = new Dictionary<string, byte[]>(); imageHeader.Add("JPG", new byte[] { 0xFF, 0xD8, 0xFF, 0xE0 }); imageHeader.Add("JPEG", new byte[] { 0xFF, 0xD8, 0xFF, 0xE0 }); imageHeader.Add("PNG", new byte[] { 0x89, 0x50, 0x4E, 0x47 }); imageHeader.Add("TIF", new byte[] { 0x49, 0x49, 0x2A, 0x00 }); imageHeader.Add("TIFF", new byte[] { 0x49, 0x49, 0x2A, 0x00 }); imageHeader.Add("GIF", new byte[] { 0x47, 0x49, 0x46, 0x38 }); imageHeader.Add("BMP", new byte[] { 0x42, 0x4D }); imageHeader.Add("ICO", new byte[] { 0x00, 0x00, 0x01, 0x00 }); HttpPostedFile file = Request.Files["myFile"]; //check file was submitted if (file != null && file.ContentLength > 0) { // å–å¾—æª”æ¡ˆå‰¯æª”å string fileExt = file.FileName.Substring(file.FileName.LastIndexOf('.') + 1).ToUpper(); // è©²å‰¯æª”åæ‡‰è©²è¦å°æ‡‰çš„Byte byte[] tmp = imageHeader[fileExt]; byte[] header = new byte[tmp.Length]; // å–å¾—Uploadæª”æ¡ˆçš„Headerè³‡è¨Š file.InputStream.Read(header, 0, header.Length); // æ¯”å°å‰¯æª”åæ˜¯å¦èˆ‡çœŸå¯¦æª”æ¡ˆé¡å‹ä¸€è‡´ if (CompareArray(tmp, header)) { lblMessage2.Text = "Valid ." + fileExt + " file."; } else { lblMessage2.Text = "Invalid ." + fileExt + " file."; } // æŒ‡å®šæ ¼å¼å­˜æ–°åœ–(é˜²æ­¢å¥‡æ€ªçš„åˆä½µåœ–æª”ï¼Œæ¿¾æ‰å¾Œé¢çš„) Stream strmStream = file.InputStream; Image image = Image.FromStream(strmStream, true); string exePath = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory; image.Save(exePath + Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(file.FileName) + "." + (new ImageFormatConverter().ConvertToString(image.RawFormat)).ToLower(), image.RawFormat); } }
